actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Montana except by express authorization of Congress.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Montana except by express authorization of Congress.

titles.title: To prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Montana except by express authorization of Congress.
